title: Danny Baker BBC London Feb 2008
description:
This is a collection of Danny Baker&#039;s BBC London Afternoon Shows.  All the shows from February 2008 are included, along with a sprinkling of January&#039;s.

The shows were recorded from DAB at 128 kbps MP2 on a Pure Bug Too onto SD card, then converted to mp3 and edited using Audacity to remove promos, travel and news where not relevant to the show.  I may have missed a promo or travel slot here or there, but generally there&#039;s a reason that they&#039;re included.

Along with Danny Baker, the shows also feature Baylen Leonard, Amy LamÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© and David Kuo  rotating as second presenter, and the show on 11th Feb has a very brief cameo of Liza Minelli on tape with Baylen Leonard (very brief, don&#039;t say I didn&#039;t warn you) recorded after she was in a studio being interviewed for another show.

Fans of the Candyman will not be disappointed!
